author: eli.j.selkin
title: PAB Container Log Processor
description: Currently, the PAB has only the returns the Haskell unit () (returned as [] in JSON). This value is irrelevant to any frontend.
solution: Develop a set of tools for parsing logs from the PAB so that they are queriable from the frontend to determine state following transactions.
experience: Eli Selkin - PPP 2nd cohort, Gimbalabs PPBL developer, frequent PAB user, CTO of Loxe inc. (numerous funded projects from Fund 6).
